abstractText: This Nepalese palm-leaf manuscript contains the Kriyāsaṃgrahapañjikā, Kuladatta's commentary on the Kriyāsaṃgraha, a Buddhist tantric ritual manual from ca. the 12th century. This is one of the manuscripts used by Tanemura in his 2004 critical edition of selected chapters of this work.
abstractShort: This Nepalese palm-leaf manuscript contains the Kriyāsaṃgrahapañjikā, Kuladatta's commentary on the Kriyāsaṃgraha, a Buddhist
title: Kriyāsaṃgrahapañjikā
